body_html:
So I think the following need to match:

  1. git commit email on all your commits
  2. email must be added to your github account
  3. email must be registered on the internal list your company has to associate emails with the corp CLA account.

If those don't match, our CLA bot can't connect all of the pieces together. Can you give this one more try? If it doesn't work, I'll rope in one of the CLA people at Google to help :)

body:
So I think the following need to match:

1) git commit email on all your commits
2) email must be added to your github account
3) email must be registered on the internal list your company has to associate emails with the corp CLA account.

If those don't match, our CLA bot can't connect all of the pieces together.  Can you give this one more try?  If it doesn't work, I'll rope in one of the CLA people at Google to help :)
